name: Monster Survival (dfmr96)
description:
Hundreds of monters will appear looking for the player, try to survive the longest time that you can choosing wisely your powerups. Dont let the monsters reach you!

Donations will support the incoming updates, will help me buying new assets for the game and will fund my iOS developer fee to be able to upload the game in the App Store.

Google Play Store app under review, will be public soon!

Thanks for all your support! Also thanks for asset's creators used in my game, i have an Credits button. Great assets!

This is a port from Mobile version, could not work properly. All your suggestions/feedback will be appreciate!
